name: Microwave High Simulator
description:
Fly like an airplane, as long as you keep smoking "trees"

wasd / arrows to move

space to shoot lasers

Lumberjacks have been harvesting "trees" and will drop them. Watch out for their axes!

Your burrito will be ready in 60 seconds (no UI for that)

Made with Godot, GIMP, LMMS, and Chiptone in 3 hours for Trijam #83: "trees"
